MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH49 postcode area of Linlithgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.22am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of complexity of the underground cable fault  and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:58pm on Friday, 26 March 2021
